title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. O, ch. I, pt. 560 - Submission And Settlement Of Grievances Of State Employees
content:

State Regulations
§ 560.1 - Definition of terms
§ 560.2 - Grievances; procedural requirements
§ 560.3 - General provisions
§ 560.4 - Time off for processing of grievances
§ 560.5 - Construction

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. O, ch. I, pt. 560

Statutory authority: Executive Order No. 42, dated October
14, 1970 [Part 1, § 1.42, supra]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
